entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
